author: phabc
content: Curious, but any further progress on this?

author: tkstanczak
content: I should know more early this week - I will have a call with Piper.

author: tkstanczak
content: We will be adding witness client on our side too.

author: guilhermesalgado9479
content: <@!278762485497069569> it's been merged into trinity/master. there aren't many nodes that support the wit/0 protocol, but if you run trinity with a `--preferred-node` pointing to one that does, it can keep up with the head of the chain quite reliably. we should have a post/screencast showing that soon

author: tkstanczak
content: That is cool. We can start enabling that in the production nodes.
